titles.title: We Are One in the Bond of Love

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are one in the bond of love We are one in the bond of love We have joined our spirits With the Spirit of God We are one in the bond of love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us praise Jesus Christ the son Praise Him now for the work begun Let us join our hearts That the world may know.{/lang-eng}
